AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: defendant arguing about the lawfulness of the immigration checkpoint stop's duration and his standing to challenge the search of the tractor-trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams: driver of the tractor-trailer at the immigration checkpoint stop, interacted with Luis Pena and gave consent for search
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Luis Pena and Manuel Hernandez: United States Border Patrol Agents involved in the immigration checkpoint stop, testified at Ramon De La Cruz's trial
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.immigration checkpoint stop: location where Ramon De La Cruz and others were stopped by United States Border Patrol Agents, with questions asked to determine citizenship status
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.search of the tractor-trailer: ensued after the immigration checkpoint stop, was challenged by Ramon De La Cruz as impermissible, subject of Ramon De La Cruz's motions
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court that denied Ramon De La Cruz's motion to suppress and his motion to dismiss the indictment on Speedy Trial Act grounds
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Zeba Williams' consent: consent given by Zeba Williams to United States Border Patrol Agent before the search of the tractor-trailer
